    • Constructor Detail

      • Regenerator

        public Regenerator()

    • Method Detail

      • saveDataBeforeGame

        public static void saveDataBeforeGame(int id)
        Called when saving the arena data (regeneration data) before a game. This method will call the SaveArenaDataEvent event before saving data.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.

      • saveWorld

        public static void saveWorld(int id)
        Saves the world to a backup folder to be loaded from after the game is over. This is useful for large arenas or to maximize performance.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.

      • saveAllBlocks

        public static void saveAllBlocks(int id)
        This method is used before the game starts to save all block data for the arena so that broken/placed blocks are reset. This will save blocks in memory, not on file (by default, is editable).
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.

      • regenerateArena

        public static void regenerateArena(int id)
        This method is used after a game to completely regenerate the arena. Will skip block regen in the event that it is not needed/does not exist. This can be used to regenerate everything all at once rather than calling everything separately.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena to regenerate

      • reloadWorld

        public static void reloadWorld(int id)
        Reloads the world that the arena is in. If the world has been backed up, it will also revert to the pregame backup. !!!! DO NOT USE IF MORE THAN ONE ARENA IS IN A SINGLE WORLD !!!!
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.

      • regenAllBlocks

        public static void regenAllBlocks(int id,
                  Cuboid regenArea)
        Regenerates all blocks within the regen area.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.
        regenArea - The cuboid region to regenerate.

      • clearGroundItems

        public static void clearGroundItems(int id,
                    Cuboid regenArea)
        Clears all items that were dropped/left on the ground
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena
        regenArea - The cuboid region to check and clear.

      • removeAllEntities

        public static void removeAllEntities(int id,
                     Cuboid regenArea)
        Removes all monsters/animals/etc from the regen area.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena
        regenArea - The cuboid region to clear.

      • resetDoors

        public static void resetDoors(int id,
              Cuboid regenArea)
        Resets all doors or openable blocks to closed. Currently will not reset doors held open with RedStone.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.
        regenArea - The cuboid region to reset.

      • clearContainerBlocks

        public static void clearContainerBlocks(int id,
                        Cuboid regenArena)
        Clears the inventory of all container blocks such as chests.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena.
        regenArena - The regen area of the arena.

      • isOpenable

        public static boolean isOpenable(org.bukkit.Material mat)
        Checks to see if the block is openable (as in a door)
        Parameters:
        mat - The material of the block to check.
        Returns:
        True if it is an openable, else false.
